contextId.information: The officer is describing a situation that could possibly happen to a soldier. AT: "so that, if he dies in battle, another man will not dedicate his house instead of him" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_hypo]])
contextId.quote: so that he does not die in battle and another man dedicates it

contextId.information: The officer is describing a situation that could possibly happen to a soldier. AT: "so that, if he dies in battle, another man will not harvest its fruit instead of him" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_hypo]])
contextId.quote: so he will not die in battle and another man enjoy its fruit

contextId.information: The officer is describing a situation that could possibly happen to a soldier. AT: "so that, if he dies in battle, another man does not marry her instead of him" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_hypo]])
contextId.quote: so that he does not die in battle and another man marries her
